errors.incorrect.choice: Oops! Looks like you ented an invalid option.

message.updates.no.update: There are no updates, returning to the menu.
message.updates.has.update: The program has been updated. To apply the setting, exit and enter again.
message.updates.input: Do you want to update now? [y/N]

tips.title: Tips
menu: Errors found in the program can be reported on github!
This is a modified version see the credits option for more information.
Don't forget to look for update!!!
You can suggest a function in the 'Discussion' tab in github.
infoGathering: Information gathering is essential for a successful attack!
